wanderingSpirit.description: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

gorillaTactics.name: Gorilla Tactics
gorillaTactics.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

neutralizingGas.name: Neutralizing Gas
neutralizingGas.description: If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle, the effects of all Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastelVeil.name: Pastel Veil
pastelVeil.description: Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from being poisoned.

hungerSwitch.name: Hunger Switch
hungerSwitch.description: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of each turn.

quickDraw.name: Quick Draw
quickDraw.description: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

unseenFist.name: Unseen Fist
unseenFist.description: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

curiousMedicine.name: Curious Medicine
curiousMedicine.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

chillingNeigh.name: Chilling Neigh
chillingNeigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

grimNeigh.name: Grim Neigh
grimNeigh.description: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

asOneGlastrier.name: As One
asOneGlastrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

asOneSpectrier.name: As One
asOneSpectrier.description: This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

lingeringAroma.name: Lingering Aroma
lingeringAroma.description: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

seedSower.name: Seed Sower
seedSower.description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

thermalExchange.name: Thermal Exchange
thermalExchange.description: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

angerShell.name: Anger Shell
angerShell.description: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

purifyingSalt.name: Purifying Salt
purifyingSalt.description: The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

wellBakedBody.name: Well-Baked Body
wellBakedBody.description: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

windRider.name: Wind Rider
windRider.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

guardDog.name: Guard Dog
guardDog.description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

windPower.name: Wind Power
windPower.description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

zeroToHero.name: Zero to Hero
zeroToHero.description: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

commander.name: Commander
commander.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

electromorphosis.name: Electromorphosis
electromorphosis.description: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

protosynthesis.name: Protosynthesis
protosynthesis.description: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

quarkDrive.name: Quark Drive
quarkDrive.description: Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

goodAsGold.name: Good as Gold
goodAsGold.description: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

vesselOfRuin.name: Vessel of Ruin
vesselOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

swordOfRuin.name: Sword of Ruin
swordOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

tabletsOfRuin.name: Tablets of Ruin
tabletsOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

beadsOfRuin.name: Beads of Ruin
beadsOfRuin.description: The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

orichalcumPulse.name: Orichalcum Pulse
orichalcumPulse.description: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

hadronEngine.name: Hadron Engine
hadronEngine.description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

opportunist.name: Opportunist
opportunist.description: If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

cudChew.name: Cud Chew
cudChew.description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

supremeOverlord.name: Supreme Overlord
supremeOverlord.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

costar.name: Costar
costar.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

toxicDebris.name: Toxic Debris
toxicDebris.description: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

armorTail.name: Armor Tail
armorTail.description: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

earthEater.name: Earth Eater
earthEater.description: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

myceliumMight.name: Mycelium Might
myceliumMight.description: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

mindsEye.name: Mind's Eye
mindsEye.description: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

supersweetSyrup.name: Supersweet Syrup
supersweetSyrup.description: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.

hospitality.name: Hospitality
hospitality.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.

toxicChain.name: Toxic Chain
toxicChain.description: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.

embodyAspectTeal.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectTeal.description: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Teal Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Speed stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectWellspring.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectWellspring.description: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Wellspring Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Sp. Def stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectHearthflame.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectHearthflame.description: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Hearthflame Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Attack stat to be boosted.

embodyAspectCornerstone.name: Embody Aspect
embodyAspectCornerstone.description: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Cornerstone Mask to shine and the Pokémon's Defense stat to be boosted.

teraShift.name: Tera Shift
teraShift.description: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

teraShell.name: Tera Shell
teraShell.description: The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

teraformZero.name: Teraform Zero
teraformZero.description: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

poisonPuppeteer.name: Poison Puppeteer
poisonPuppeteer.description: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.

unleashed.name: Unleashed
unleashed.description: Boosts the power of all moves when HP is low.

hellFlame.name: Hell Flame
hellFlame.description: Boosts the power of Fire-type moves by 50%.

psychoLeaf.name: Psycho Leaf
psychoLeaf.description: Changes Grass-type moves to Psychic-type and boosts their power by 20%.

groundFlame.name: Ground Flame
groundFlame.description: Changes Fire-type moves to Ground-type and boosts their power by 20%.

magicalWater.name: Magical Water
magicalWater.description: Changes Water-type moves to Fairy-type and boosts their power by 20%.

nuclearEnergy.name: Nuclear Energy
nuclearEnergy.description: Changes Poison-type moves to Electric-type and boosts their power by 20%.

poisonKing.name: Poison King
poisonKing.description: Boosts the power of Poison-type moves by 60%.

solidKong.name: Solid Kong
solidKong.description: Reduces damage from super effective moves by 50%.

screepy.name: Screepy
screepy.description: Ghost-type moves can hit Normal-types. Boosts Ghost-type moves by 30%. Immune to Intimidate.

godFist.name: God Fist
godFist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 50%.

parentalHaunting.name: Parental Haunting
parentalHaunting.description: Changes non-Normal-type moves to Ghost-type and boosts their power by 20%.

nightmarate.name: Nightmarate
nightmarate.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Primary-type and boosts their power by 20%.

terrify.name: Terrify
terrify.description: Lowers the opponent's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage when entering battle.

thunderAndFire.name: Thunder and Fire
thunderAndFire.description: Fire and Electric-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

electafireAbsorb.name: Electafire Absorb
electafireAbsorb.description: Heals HP when hit by Fire or Electric-type moves instead of taking damage.

dirtThick.name: Dirt Thick
dirtThick.description: Halves damage from Water and Ground-type moves.

arcticBlaze.name: Arctic Blaze
arcticBlaze.description: Changes Ice-type moves to Fire-type and vice versa, boosting their power by 35% when HP is below 65%.

steamify.name: Steamify
steamify.description: Changes Water-type moves to Fire-type and boosts their power by 20%.

prehistoricHunt.name: Prehistoric Hunt
prehistoricHunt.description: 30% chance to change weather to Rain each turn. Doubles Speed in Rain or Harsh Sunlight or Hail or Snow or Heavy Rain.

popUp.name: Pop Up
popUp.description: Lowers Defense by 1 stage and raises Speed by 1 stage when entering battle.

earthSpeeder.name: Earth Speeder
earthSpeeder.description: Raises Speed by 1 stage when hit by a Ground-type move.

knockout.name: Knockout
knockout.description: 35% chance to land a critical hit when HP is below 50%.

finalRound.name: Final Round
finalRound.description: Boosts the power of Fighting-type moves when HP is low.

kickPunch.name: Kick Punch
kickPunch.description: Boosts the power of kicking and punching moves by 30%.

stabNormal.name: Stab Normal
stabNormal.description: Boosts the power of Normal-type moves by 30%.

adaptiveAi.name: Adaptive AI
adaptiveAi.description: Raises stats by 1 or 2 stages depending on the opponent's highest stat. Raises Defense if opponent's highest stat is Attack, Special Defense if opponent's highest stat is Special Attack, Special Attack if opponent's highest stat is Special Defense, or Speed by 2 stages if opponent's highest stat is Speed.

electric.name: Electric
electric.description: Boosts Electric-type moves by 50%, takes double damage from Water, and changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type with 20% power.

existence.name: Existence
existence.description: Boosts all moves by 20%, neutralizes super effective moves, and neutralizes moves that would be super effective against the target.

allConsuming.name: All Consuming
allConsuming.description: Restores 1/8 of max HP and deals 1/8 of max HP as damage to the opponent when hit by a contact move.

corrupt.name: Corrupt
corrupt.description: Has a 70% chance to badly poison the target after attacking.

dragonKing.name: Dragon King
dragonKing.description: Boosts the power of Dragon-type moves by 60%.

sandCorruption.name: Sand Corruption
sandCorruption.description: Damages the attacker by 1/8 of its max HP and lowers its Speed by 1 stage if hit by a contact move.

organicTwist.name: Organic Twist
organicTwist.description: Grass and Rock-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

healthySoak.name: Healthy Soak
healthySoak.description: Raises Speed and Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move.

inkBlindness.name: Ink Blindness
inkBlindness.description: Has a 35% chance to confuse the target after attacking.

inkFry.name: Ink Fry
inkFry.description: Lowers the target's Speed and Special Defense by 1 stage after using a Water-type move.

mooTime.name: Moo Time
mooTime.description: Raises Defense and Speed by 50% when HP is below 50%.

fuelExchange.name: Fuel Exchange
fuelExchange.description: Raises Speed by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move. Restores 1/4 of max HP when hit by a Grass-type move. Raises Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Dark-type move. Raises Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Fairy-type move. Raises Special Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Psychic-type move. Raises Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Ice-type move.

sunAndMoon.name: Sun and Moon
sunAndMoon.description: Boosts the power of Fire-type and Rock-type moves by 20%.

nightAndDay.name: Night and Day
nightAndDay.description: Has a 40% chance to inflict burn on contact when HP is above 50%, or a 35% chance to inflict sleep on contact when HP is below 50%.

twoHalves.name: Two Halves
twoHalves.description: Survives a hit that would knock it out and then sharply lowers foe's Speed, and restores 50% HP.

alienRock.name: Alien Rock
alienRock.description: Psychic and Rock-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

robot.name: Robot
robot.description: Raises ALL stats by 1 stage when entering battle. Lowers a random stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

golemPlus.name: Golem Plus
golemPlus.description: Boosts the power of Rock-type moves by 30% and increases Defense by 30%.

nightmareFuel.name: Nightmare Fuel
nightmareFuel.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Primary-type and boosts their power by 20%.

smittyxtvVirus.name: SmittyNugget Virus
smittyxtvVirus.description: Raises the highest stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent. 50% chance to lower a random stat of the target by 1 stage after attacking.

staticCharge.name: Static Charge
staticCharge.description: Applies the Charged status to the attacker on contact. 30% chance to paralyze on contact.

darkStampede.name: Dark Stampede
darkStampede.description: Raises a random stat by 1 stage after using a Dark-type move.

colorChangeDefense.name: Color Change Defense
colorChangeDefense.description: Changes the user's type to match the type of move it was hit by. If the user isn't already the same type, it also heals 1/8 of its max HP.

colorChangeSteal.name: Color Change Steal
colorChangeSteal.description: Changes the user's type to match the type of move it was hit by. Steals the target's held item if the user shares a type with the target.

hauntingEcho.name: Haunting Echo
hauntingEcho.description: 30% chance to paralyze the target and deal 1/16 of its max HP as damage when using a Ghost-type move.

maternalShade.name: Maternal Shade
maternalShade.description: Has a 50% chance to quarter the damage of incoming attacks.

gravePower.name: Grave Power
gravePower.description: Boosts move power by 150% when HP is below 40%. 30% chance to badly poison the target.

undead.name: Undead
undead.description: Has a 70% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out.

scaleArmor.name: Scale Armor
scaleArmor.description: Reduces damage from Water, Electric, Fire, and Grass-type moves by 25%.

pixelatedTongue.name: Pixelated Tongue
pixelatedTongue.description: 30% chance to inflict a random status condition and lower a random stat of the target by 1 stage.

staticTaste.name: Static Taste
staticTaste.description: Boosts move power by 50% against paralyzed targets. 35% chance to paralyze the target.

rockyHorrorShow.name: Rocky Horror Show
rockyHorrorShow.description: Prevents the opponent from switching out. Raises two random stats by 1 stage when entering battle.

hauntingBroadcast.name: Haunting Broadcast
hauntingBroadcast.description: Curses all opposing Pokemon when the user faints.

ectoplasmicTouch.name: Ectoplasmic Touch
ectoplasmicTouch.description: Damages the attacker by 1/12 of its max HP when hit by a contact move. Also damages the target by 1/12 of its max HP when using a contact move.

toxicCombustion.name: Toxic Combustion
toxicCombustion.description: Deals 1/8 of the attacker's max HP as damage if they are badly poisoned. 30% chance to badly poison the target.

flamingEmission.name: Flaming Emission
flamingEmission.description: Fire and Poison-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

burningDisease.name: Burning Disease
burningDisease.description: Deals 1/8 of the attacker's max HP as damage if they are burned. 30% chance to burn the target.

steadyStance.name: Steady Stance
steadyStance.description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, and Special Defense by 20%.

balancedKick.name: Balanced Kick
balancedKick.description: Kicking moves never miss and have their power boosted by 20%.

phantomPouch.name: Phantom Pouch
phantomPouch.description: 30% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP after being hit or attacking. Increases item drops after battle.

hauntingScythe.name: Haunting Scythe
hauntingScythe.description: Changes it's attacks to SPECIAL or PHYSICAL based on the opponent's weaker defense stat.

soulCollector.name: Soul Collector
soulCollector.description: Boosts moves that match collected types. Collects the type of knocked out Pokemon. Loses collected types when fainting.

shadowSync.name: Shadow Sync
shadowSync.description: Raises the user's highest stats by 1 when the opponent's stat changes. Boosts the power of all moves by 20%.

frightfulCute.name: Frightful Cute
frightfulCute.description: Has a 33% chance to boost move power by 50% or halve the damage taken from attacks.

ghostify.name: Ghostify
ghostify.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Ghost-type and boosts their power by 40%.

foreverPartner.name: Forever Partner
foreverPartner.description: Boosts the power of all moves by 30%. Has a 40% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out.

newAdaption.name: New Adaption
newAdaption.description: Halves damage from Fire and Ground-type moves. Doubles the power of Steel-type moves against Fire, Poison, and Water-type Pokemon.

steelStealer.name: Steel Stealer
steelStealer.description: Raises Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Steel-type move.

teraForce.name: Tera Force
teraForce.description: Ground-type moves can hit Flying-types. Boosts Ground-type moves by 30%. Immune to Intimidate.

mudiate.name: Mudiate
mudiate.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Ground-type and boosts their power by 20% and gives them 20% chance to lower the foe's accuracy.

gottaGoFast.name: Gotta Go Fast
gottaGoFast.description: Doubles power if moving first. Takes double damage if moving second.

imBlue.name: I'm Blue
imBlue.description: Boosts Water-type moves. Resists Fire, Water, and Steel-type moves. Boosts power by 50% against Fire, Ground, and Rock-type Pokemon.

notShadow.name: Not Shadow
notShadow.description: Immune to Dark, Steel, and Ghost-type moves. Raises Attack, Defense, or Speed respectively when hit by a Dark, Steel, or Ghost-type move.

animified.name: Animified
animified.description: Resists Normal and Fighting-type moves. Weak to Poison-type moves. Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and are boosted by 20%. 30% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out.

longForgotten.name: Long Forgotten
longForgotten.description: Lowers Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage when entering battle.

waaaa.name: Waaaa
waaaa.description: Has a 25% chance to land a critical hit. 10% chance to badly poison the target.

tooLate.name: Too Late
tooLate.description: Moves always go last. 35% chance to confuse, make drowsy, infest, or curse the target.

memoriesOfTennis.name: Memories of Tennis
memoriesOfTennis.description: Boosts the power of ball, sphere, orb, circle, bounce, and yellow-related moves by 50%. 30% chance to make the target flinch when using these moves.

fireRafRaf.name: Fire Raf Raf
fireRafRaf.description: Boosts Fire-type moves by 50%. Takes double damage from Water. Normal-type moves become Fire-type and are boosted by 20%.

positivity.name: Positivity
positivity.description: Boosts Electric-type moves by 20%. Has a 30% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out. 33% chance to halve damage from attacks.

unfazed.name: Unfazed
unfazed.description: Halves damage from super effective moves.

nightmareSauce.name: Nightmare Sauce
nightmareSauce.description: 50% chance to give the target the Comatose ability. 30% chance to give the target the Nightmare status, if they have the Comatose ability.

hashSlingingSlasher.name: Hash Slinging Slasher
hashSlingingSlasher.description: Doubles the power of slicing moves.

lifeAdvice.name: Life Advice
lifeAdvice.description: Raises a random stat by 1 stage when entering battle. 40% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP when hit by an attack.

woodCutter.name: Wood Cutter
woodCutter.description: Boosts move power by 150% against Grass-type Pokemon. Raises Attack and Speed by 1 stage after knocking out a Grass-type Pokemon.

axe.name: Axe
axe.description: Boosts the power of slicing moves by 50%. Boosts Steel-type moves by 30%.

rubberMan.name: Rubber Man
rubberMan.description: Halves damage from Physical and Steel-type moves. Electric-type move immunity and raises Attack by 1 stage. Takes double damage from Water-type moves. Boosts Normal, Fighting, and Flying-type moves by 50%.

conquerorHaki.name: Conqueror Haki
conquerorHaki.description: 20% chance to double move power. 10% chance to put the target to sleep or paralyze it on contact.

stretchy.name: Stretchy
stretchy.description: 50% chance to WRAP the target, preventing it from switching out and damaging it each turn.

demonSwordsman.name: Demon Swordsman
demonSwordsman.description: Boosts the power of slicing moves by 50%. Steel, Ghost, and Dark-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

cursedBlades.name: Cursed Blades
cursedBlades.description: Boosts the power of slicing moves by 50%. 20% chance to curse the target.

strawhat.name: Strawhat
strawhat.description: Has a 15% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out. Boosts move power based on the number of fainted allies (up to 100% boost).

fairyFear.name: Fairy Fear
fairyFear.description: Boosts Fairy-type moves by 20%. 10% chance to make the target flinch.

shadowCharm.name: Shadow Charm
shadowCharm.description: Lowers Attack by 1 stage when entering battle. Prevents the opponent from switching out.

yinYang.name: Yin Yang
yinYang.description: Ghost and Fairy-type moves share their type advantage against the same types!

stubbornStance.name: Stubborn Stance
stubbornStance.description: Has a 70% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out.

miseryTouch.name: Misery Touch
miseryTouch.description: Changes a random stat of the target by 1 stage after attacking.

justAJerk.name: Just a Jerk
justAJerk.description: Lowers Defense by 1 stage when entering battle. Boosts Dark-type moves by 20%.

bugabugabuga.name: Bugabugabuga
bugabugabuga.description: Lowers all stats by 1 stage when entering battle. Prevents the opponent from switching out. Takes 20% more damage from attacks.

justAMaskedJerk.name: Just a Masked Jerk
justAMaskedJerk.description: Lowers Defense and a random stat by 1 stage when entering battle. Boosts the power of all moves by 20%.

flameSpirit.name: Flame Spirit
flameSpirit.description: 10% chance to burn the target. Instead of taking damage from Fire-type moves, raises two random stats by 1 stage.

soulBurn.name: Soul Burn
soulBurn.description: 30% chance to burn the target. Deals 1/8 of the attacker's max HP as damage if they are burned.

falseSafety.name: False Safety
falseSafety.description: Lowers Special Defense by 1 stage when entering battle. 10% chance to burn, put to sleep, or paralyze attackers on contact.

forestFury.name: Forest Fury
forestFury.description: Boosts the power of Grass-type moves by 150% when HP is below 50%.

vineFist.name: Vine Fist
vineFist.description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%. 30% chance to seed or bind the target when using punching moves.

theAvatar.name: The Avatar
theAvatar.description: Boosts Fire, Water, Flying, and Ground-type moves by 20%.

enlightened.name: Enlightened
enlightened.description: Boosts Psychic-type moves by 20%. Moves that would be not very effective become neutral.

happyLittleAccidents.name: Happy Little Accidents
happyLittleAccidents.description: Boosts moves with 65-85 power by 50%. Boosts moves with 60 or less power by 75%.

originalAsmr.name: Original ASMR
originalAsmr.description: 20% chance to put the target to sleep. Reduces damage taken by 20%. Boosts sound-based moves by 30%. Halves damage from sound-based moves.

insectInfusion.name: Insect Infusion
insectInfusion.description: 50% chance to infest the target for 5 turns.

sentientAnt.name: Sentient Ant
sentientAnt.description: Raises stats by 1 or 2 stages depending on the opponent's highest stat. Raises Defense if opponent's highest stat is Attack, Special Defense if opponent's highest stat is Special Attack, Special Attack if opponent's highest stat is Special Defense, or Speed by 2 stages if opponent's highest stat is Speed.

antRegen.name: Ant Regen
antRegen.description: Restores HP at the end of each turn.

v8Engine.name: V8 Engine
v8Engine.description: Raises Speed by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

selfDriving.name: Self Driving
selfDriving.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Psychic-type and boosts their power by 50%.

limitedEdition.name: Limited Edition
limitedEdition.description: Raises two random stats by 1 stage when entering battle. 33% chance to boost move power by 20%.

fieryDisguise.name: Fiery Disguise
fieryDisguise.description: The Pokemon is protected from damage when it enters a battle or when its HP is full. This protection is removed after the Pokemon takes damage. Fire-type moves charge this ability.

playfulBlaze.name: Playful Blaze
playfulBlaze.description: Boosts Fire-type moves when HP is low. 30% chance to raise Attack by 1 stage after using a Fire-type move. 10% chance to burn the target when using a Fairy-type move.

aquaDisguise.name: Aqua Disguise
aquaDisguise.description: The Pokemon is protected from damage when it enters a battle or when its HP is full. This protection is removed after the Pokemon takes damage. Water-type moves charge this ability.

phantomTorrent.name: Phantom Torrent
phantomTorrent.description: Boosts Water-type moves when HP is low. 30% chance to raise Special Attack by 1 stage after using a Water-type move. 10% chance to trap the target in a whirlpool when using a Fairy-type move.

sillyPressure.name: Silly Pressure
sillyPressure.description: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokemon. 30% chance to raise Attack by 1 stage after using a Psychic-type move. 10% chance to encore the target when using a Fairy-type move.

telekineticDisguise.name: Telekinetic Disguise
telekineticDisguise.description: The Pokemon is protected from damage when it enters a battle or when its HP is full. This protection is removed after the Pokemon takes damage. Psychic-type moves charge this ability.

electricDisguise.name: Electric Disguise
electricDisguise.description: The Pokemon is protected from damage when it enters a battle or when its HP is full. This protection is removed after the Pokemon takes damage. Electric-type moves charge this ability.

lovelyStatic.name: Lovely Static
lovelyStatic.description: 30% chance to paralyze the attacker on contact. 30% chance to raise Special Attack by 1 stage after using an Electric-type move. 20% chance to infatuate the target when using a Fairy-type move if they are the opposite gender.

ancientDisguise.name: Ancient Disguise
ancientDisguise.description: The Pokemon is protected from damage when it enters a battle or when its HP is full. This protection is removed after the Pokemon takes damage. Rock-type moves charge this ability.

madeToLast.name: Made to Last
madeToLast.description: Has a 40% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out. 30% chance to raise Speed by 1 stage after using a Rock-type move. 10% chance to trap the target when using a Fairy-type move.

multiPiece.name: Multi Piece

knightsShovel.description: Doubles the power of Ground and Steel-type moves if the user shares a weakness with the target. Immune to Ground-type moves.

heroicLeap.name: Heroic Leap
heroicLeap.description: Immune to Ground-type moves. Raises Attack by 1 stage when entering battle. Changes Normal-type moves to Flying-type and boosts their power by 20%.

eightBitHunger.name: Eight Bit Hunger
eightBitHunger.description: 50% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP after attacking. 10% chance to make the target flinch.

rockSolidMeme.name: Rock Solid Meme
rockSolidMeme.description: Normal and Rock-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Reduces damage from super effective moves by 25%.

rockRoll.name: Rock Roll
rockRoll.description: Boosts Rock-type moves by 20%. Boosts moves with 'roll' or 'spin' in their name by 75%. 20% chance to make the target flinch when using a move with 'roll' or 'spin' in its name.

staticShock.name: Static Shock
staticShock.description: 30% chance to paralyze the target. Boosts move power by 50% against paralyzed targets.

horrorShow.name: Horror Show
horrorShow.description: Prevents the opponent from switching out. Raises the highest stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent.

sunbather.name: Sunbather
sunbather.description: Fire and Water-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Changes Normal-type moves to Water-type and boosts their power by 20%. Restores 1/8 of max HP at the end of each turn during harsh sunlight. 30% chance to change the weather to harsh sunlight at the end of each turn.

seedEater.name: Seed Eater
seedEater.description: Heals HP when hit by Grass-type moves instead of taking damage. Doubles move power against Grass-type Pokemon. Restores 1/8 of max HP when attacking a Grass-type Pokemon. Restores 1/2 of max HP when hit by seed-based moves.

vacaySoul.name: Vacay Soul
vacaySoul.description: Triples the power of all moves. The Pokemon can only attack every other turn.

screenSwim.name: Screen Swim
screenSwim.description: Steel and Water-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Restores 1/8 of max HP at the end of each turn during rain. 10% chance to make the target flinch. 30% chance to change the weather to rain at the end of each turn.

darkWaters.name: Dark Waters
darkWaters.description: Dark and Water-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Changes Normal-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%. 10% chance to trap the target in a whirlpool when using a Water or Dark-type move. 10% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP when using a Water or Dark-type move.

experimentError.name: Experiment Error
experimentError.description: Lowers a random stat by 1 stage when entering battle. 10% chance to seed or trap the target in a whirlpool. 10% chance to burn the target. 30% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP after attacking.

roundingError.name: Rounding Error
roundingError.description: Halves damage from moves with power divisible by 5 but not by 10. Boosts moves with power not divisible by 10 or divisible by 5 by 50%.

idealForm.name: Ideal Form
idealForm.description: 10% chance for each: critical hit, halve damage taken, double move power, restore 1/8 of max HP after being hit or attacking.

eliteStatic.name: Elite Static
eliteStatic.description: 50% chance to paralyze the attacker on contact. Lowers a random stat of the attacker by 1 stage on contact. Damages the attacker by 1/8 of its max HP when hit by a contact move.

cockadoodleYes.name: Cockadoodle Yes
cockadoodleYes.description: Raises a random stat by 1 stage when entering battle. Raises the highest stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent. Boosts the power of contact moves by 30%.

carnivore.name: Carnivore
carnivore.description: Restores 1/8 of max HP when attacking certain types of Pokemon. Raises Attack and Speed by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent.

nightShow.name: Night Show
nightShow.description: Lowers a random stat of the opponent by 2 stages at the end of each turn.

nightmareHost.name: Nightmare Host
nightmareHost.description: 50% chance for moves to go first. 10% chance to paralyze, poison, or burn the target.

pressurePlay.name: Pressure Play
pressurePlay.description: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokemon by 2. Lowers Attack by 1 stage when entering battle.

aBCOrD.name: A, B, C, or D
aBCOrD.description: 10% chance to raise Attack by 1 stage. 10% chance to burn the target. 10% chance to confuse the target. 10% chance to make the target drowsy.

midnightCookies.name: Midnight Cookies
midnightCookies.description: 30% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP at the end of each turn. 30% chance to raise a random stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

horribleCardboard.name: Horrible Cardboard
horribleCardboard.description: Changes all moves to Normal-type and boosts their power by 20%. Normal-type moves can hit Ghost-types. 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP.

theElderShadows.name: The Elder Shadows
theElderShadows.description: Ghost and Dark-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Changes Normal-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%. 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/16 of the target's max HP at the end of each turn. 30% chance to double move power. Raises a random stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent.

horribleGhostCardboard.name: Horrible Ghost Cardboard
horribleGhostCardboard.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Ghost-type and boosts their power by 20%. Ghost-type moves can hit Normal-types. 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP.

midnightCookiesOfDeath.name: Midnight Cookies of Death
midnightCookiesOfDeath.description: 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP at the end of each turn. 30% chance to raise a random stat by 1 stage at the end of each turn.

infomercialFame.name: Infomercial Fame
infomercialFame.description: Raises all stats by 1 stage when entering battle. 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP at the end of each turn.

winnersGrin.name: Winner's Grin
winnersGrin.description: Raises the highest stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent. Raises a random stat by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent.

fancyCardboard.name: Fancy Cardboard
fancyCardboard.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Normal-type and boosts their power by 20%. Normal-type moves can hit Ghost-types. Boosts moves with 60 or less power by 50%.

unjustified.name: Unjustified
unjustified.description: Normal and Fighting-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Halves damage from Fairy-type moves. Raises Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Fairy-type move.

abyssalStance.name: Abyssal Stance
abyssalStance.description: 30% chance to raise a random stat by 1 stage after being hit by an attack. 30% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP after being hit by an attack. 10% chance to lower a random stat of the user by 1 stage after attacking. Changes Normal-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%.

leafyLure.name: Leafy Lure
leafyLure.description: 50% chance to halve damage from super effective moves. 50% chance to deal damage equal to 1/4 of the attacker's max HP when hit by a super effective move. 50% chance to restore 1/6 of max HP when hit by a super effective move.

voraciousVegetation.name: Voracious Vegetation
voraciousVegetation.description: Restores 1/8 of max HP when attacking certain types of Pokemon. Raises Attack and Speed by 1 stage after knocking out an opponent.

solarPowerPlus.name: Solar Power Plus
solarPowerPlus.description: Doubles Special Attack. 30% chance to change the weather to harsh sunlight at the end of each turn.

treasureGuard.name: Treasure Guard
treasureGuard.description: Randomly reduces damage taken by 25-50%. 30% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP after being hit by an attack.

goldenSkillLink.name: Golden Skill Link
goldenSkillLink.description: Maximizes the number of times multi-hit moves hit. 5% chance to raise a random stat by 1 stage after attacking.

treasureProducer.name: Treasure Producer
treasureProducer.description: 50% chance to steal the target's held item. Increases item drops after battle. Moves always go last.

multiMind.name: Multi Mind
multiMind.description: Fire and Psychic-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Changes Normal-type moves to Psychic-type and boosts their power by 20%. 10% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP.

wakaFlockaFlame.name: Waka Flocka Flame
wakaFlockaFlame.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Fire-type and boosts their power by 20%. Flying and Fire-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! 10% chance to burn the target. Immune to Fire-type moves and heals HP when hit by Fire-type moves instead of taking damage.

eerieLight.name: Eerie Light
eerieLight.description: Electric and Dark-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Changes Normal-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%. Changes Water-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%. 10% chance to confuse the target. 10% chance to paralyze the target.

abyssalLure.name: Abyssal Lure
abyssalLure.description: 50% chance to halve damage from super effective moves. 50% chance to deal damage equal to 1/4 of the attacker's max HP when hit by a super effective move. 50% chance to restore 1/6 of max HP when hit by a super effective move.

nemoEater.name: Nemo Eater
nemoEater.description: Doubles move power against Water-type Pokemon. Restores 1/8 of max HP after knocking out a Water-type Pokemon. Raises the highest stat by 1 stage after knocking out a Water-type Pokemon.

woodenLie.name: Wooden Lie
woodenLie.description: Doubles move power against certain types of Pokemon. Reduces damage from super effective moves by 25%.

imARealBoy.name: I'm a Real Boy
imARealBoy.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Normal-type and boosts their power by 20%. Changes non-Fairy and non-Grass-type moves to Normal-type and boosts their power by 30%. Lowers Attack and a random stat by 1 stage when entering battle.

lierLyer.name: Lier Lyer
lierLyer.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Dark-type and boosts their power by 20%. Fairy and Dark-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! Has a 10% chance to survive a hit that would knock it out.

copycatNinja.name: Copycat Ninja
copycatNinja.description: Changes the user's type to match the type of move it was hit by. If the user isn't already the same type, it also heals 1/8 of its max HP.

hokage.name: Hokage
hokage.description: Boosts Fire, Water, Flying, and Ground-type moves by 20%.

sharinganActivated.name: Sharingan Activated
sharinganActivated.description: Changes the user's type to match it's attack.

crowClone.name: Crow Clone
crowClone.description: Changes Normal-type moves to Flying-type and boosts their power by 20%. Dark, Fire, and Flying-type moves share their type advantage against the same types! 30% chance to halve damage from attacks. 30% chance to restore 1/8 of max HP after being hit by an attack.

sharinganMastery.name: Sharingan Mastery
sharinganMastery.description: 15% chance to deal damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP. 5% chance to quarter damage taken from attacks. 15% chance to raise a random stat by 1 stage after attacking.

foreheadTap.name: Forehead Tap
foreheadTap.description: Boosts moves with 60 or less power by 50%. 10% chance to make the target flinch when using moves with 60 or less power. 10% chance to paralyze the target when using moves with 60 or less power.

rappingRampage.name: Rapping Rampage
rappingRampage.description: Changes all moves to sound-based and boosts their power by 20%. Boosts sound-based moves by 50%. 10% chance to make the target flinch.

beastMode.name: Beast Mode
beastMode.description: Doubles move power when HP is below 40%.

nightmareSand.name: Nightmare Sand
nightmareSand.description: Deals damage equal to 1/8 of the target's max HP at the end of each turn during a sandstorm. 30% chance to lower a random stat of the target by 1 stage at the end of each turn during a sandstorm. 30% chance to change the weather to a sandstorm at the end of each turn.

soulEater.name: Soul Eater
soulEater.description: Heals HP when using a move that matches a collected type. Collects the type of knocked out Pokemon. Loses collected types when fainting.

soulDrain.name: Soul Drain
soulDrain.description: 10% chance to collect the type of the move used. Lowers two random stats of the target by 2 stages if the move type matches a collected type. Loses collected types when fainting.
